page.title: 16In Case of Fire - Darwen
page.content: Fire services are provided by Darwen Fire Station which has two appliances, one full-time and one part-time. There is a standard response to all calls and two appliances would attend a factory fire, even to Crown Paints where many highly inflammable materials are used. The officer in charge assesses the requirement and sends for extra help if required. Reinforcements would be called from around the area and the order of request would be similar to: Blackburn force, Oswaldtwistle, Accrington, Great Harwood, Chorley, Burnley, Padiham and further afield in a widening circle. There are at least 7 fires each week in the Darwen area. Recently, there have been 4 injuries - two serious burns, a serious leg and a serious head injury.
